price: 56. Then We raised you up after your death, so that you might be grateful.
arabic: ثُمَّ بَعَثۡنَٰكُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ مَوۡتِكُمۡ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: thumma baʿathnākum min baʿdi mawtikum laʿallakum tashkurūna
